sentences.en: April days in Portland, Oregon, can convince you that winter will never end.
sentences.cn: 俄勒冈州波特兰4月的天气会让你相信冬天永远不会结束.

sentences.en: Check out this extensive reference, also at University of Oregon.
sentences.cn: 检阅这份也来自于奥勒冈大学的丰富资料.

sentences.en: Dad had been a lumberjack in Washington and Oregon.
sentences.cn: 爸爸曾经在华盛顿州和俄勒冈州做过伐木工.

sentences.en: Design Review and Community Design Standards , City of Portland Oregon.
sentences.cn: 回顾显示代码内容的表格, 显示替选方案及任意设计案之评论程序.

sentences.en: From Astoria , Oregon , to Yorktown, Ontario.
sentences.cn: 从俄勒冈州的 阿斯托里亚 到安大略湖的约克镇.

sentences.en: Growing from south - west Oregon to California along the Pacific Coast.
sentences.cn: 生长于奥勒冈西南部至加州之太平洋沿岸.

sentences.en: Her family was back in Oregon.
sentences.cn: 她的家人都在俄勒冈州。

sentences.en: It is selling watermelon juice in California and Oregon.
sentences.cn: 该公司在加利福尼亚和俄勒冈州出售西瓜汁.

sentences.en: Oregon conducts its elections entirely by mail, but it is the only state to do so at present.
sentences.cn: 俄勒冈州完全通过邮寄方式进行选举投票，但它是目前唯一这样做的州。

sentences.en: Oregon was the first to pass it on February 21, 1887.
sentences.cn: 俄勒冈州于1887年2月21日首先通过.

sentences.en: Right. Try telling that to the Oregon State Beavers.
sentences.cn: 好的, 去告诉俄勒冈州海狸队.

sentences.en: The buildings are near the city of Astoria, Oregon.
sentences.cn: 这个纪念馆离俄勒冈州的阿斯托里亚市很近.

sentences.en: The Columbia River now separates the states of Washington and Oregon.
sentences.cn: 现在,哥伦比亚河是华盛顿州和俄勒冈州的分界线.

sentences.en: The other pictures were of Oregon, where Nick and Mary Ann had moved from four years ago.
sentences.cn: 其他照片是尼克和玛丽安在俄勒冈州照的，他们四年前才从那里搬过来。

sentences.en: The teacher challenged my statement that rice grows in Oregon.
sentences.cn: 教师对我所说的水稻生长在俄勒冈州提出质疑.

sentences.en: United Airlines flight was scheduled to depart for Portland , Oregon.
sentences.cn: 联合航空公司的航班原定飞往波特兰.

sentences.en: We leave for the very plausible state of Oregon at eight A . M.
sentences.cn: 我们上午8点前往“有可能的”俄勒冈州.

sentences.en: Wherever they get their power, it's not from oregon power and light.
sentences.cn: 不管他们是从哪儿牵的电, 那都不是从俄勒冈搞来的.
